text: Dominik Distelberger (born 16 March 1990) is an Austrian athlete competing in the decathlon. He represented his country at the 2016 Summer Olympics finishing 19th. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=4|2007 |rowspan=2|European Youth Olympic Festival
